name: Bakon Cocoa Chpater 1
description:
Story :
There was a very scary house, we call it a house of fear, they say that who ever goes inside he never gets out. So I decided to go to explore it and I jumped to the garden and suddenly I got knocked down. I woke up and I find myself locked inside the house,
You have to escape from the house, find keys and tools to get ride of locks on the main door. Be careful, scary old man Bakon and scary granny women cocoa are chasing you.
Enjoy playing the game
